::KitKat::

She responded to her link,"I'm OK, I"ll be back to the base soon."
She turned off her link and looked at Phobia.  She was really tired, 
but still had some questions. "Phobia, what weapons do you have that 
I may use to fight them with? I will need,(yawns) power weapons to 
fight the VOK and Megatron."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit came out of his room, and walked to the main room. He had
> finished his project, but he didn't know how to implement it. It 
was a
> strong weopon, and whoever held it could lead. He didn't want to 
take
> over anymore, he would give it to KitKat. He saw that KitKat wasn't
> around, so he opened his comm-link.
> "KitKat? Its DrillBit. Where are you?" He asked.
